Stefano_package.components._3d

Class CadParallelepiped

  • java.lang.Object
    • Stefano_package.components.CadComponent
      • Stefano_package.components.CadComponent3D
        • Stefano_package.components._3d.CadParallelepiped
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICadComponent

    public class CadParallelepiped
extends CadComponent3D
    This concrete class represent a parallelepiped, with the base point at the lower left vertex of the base. It has a static number that helps generating automatically non-colliding names and obviously three dimension parameters.
    Author:
    Stefano Demarchi

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface Stefano_package.components.ICadComponent

      • projection

        public int[] projection(ICadComponent.Axis ax)
        Description copied from interface: ICadComponent
        This method will be used in order to detect collisions: it projects the component on the selected axis (2D component) or on the plane where the axis is the normal (3D component)
        Parameters:
        ax - the axis to project on
        Returns:
        the x1 and x2 of the segment in a 2-element array
